title: Client is really laggy after recent patch
body: Today I opened my League of Legends client. Once I got on to the login screen, everything was lagging hard. When I tried getting into a custom game with my friend, it took about 5 minutes for my game to start loading. When I finally got into the game, I had 10 frames instead of my usual 60. Please help me.

replies.body: It sounds like your pc might be under some stress, or other issues causing your frame to drop.  To start, I recommend enabling [low spec mode](https://i.gyazo.com/a39e12ca76e54359342203c476a0e9c1.png) to reduce any stress during champion select.  You'll then want to go over the steps in the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to make sure your drivers and game files are in healthy condition.  Test it out in a custom game and let me know!
OK, the full repair has fixed my game, but my client is still really laggy. I have low spec mode on, and I know it's not my internet.
My game was working just fine yesterday. My friend said this also happened to him today. He told me to try to do a full repair on my client to fix it.
